description.html: Whenever a creature misses a melee attack against you when they are within 5 feet of you by the amount of AC your shield confers or less, the shield knocks them prone of its own accord, dealing 1d4 bludgeoning damage to the attacking creature.

Mithral is a light, flexible metal. A mithral chain shirt or breastplate can be worn under normal clothes. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks or has a Strength requirement, the mithral version of the armor doesn't.

Diamond Reduction. When you are hit by an attack, as a reaction you may reduce the attack's damage by 4d10. This property may be used 4 times, and this armor regains all expended uses daily at dawn.
